short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A program designed to help fight against procrastination. It's capable of denying access to 20+ social media & news websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Can't control yourself and find yourself scrolling through social media or news articles? This is for you!

Distractionless is a program designed to help students and workers control themselves from scrolling through the web and instead, be more productive. The extension blocks all popular US social media and news sites so you are more focused on getting your assignment or project done.
